channel.title: nlin.SI updates on arXiv.org
channel.description: nlin.SI updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: A classification of automorphic Lie algebras on complex tori
item.description: arXiv:2405.13598v1 Announce Type: cross Abstract: We classify the automorphic Lie algebras of equivariant maps from a complex torus to $\mathfrak{sl}_2(\mathbb{C})$. For each case we compute a basis in a normal form. The automorphic Lie algebras correspond precisely to two disjoint families of Lie algebras parametrised by the modular curve of $\mathrm{PSL}_2(\mathbb{Z})$, apart from four cases, which are all isomorphic to Onsager's algebra.
item.dc:creator: Vincent Knibbeler, Sara Lombardo, Casper Oelen

item.title: Tetrahedron duality
item.description: arXiv:2405.02870v2 Announce Type: replace-cross Abstract: A certain two-dimensional supersymmetric gauge theory is argued to satisfy a relation that promotes the Zamolodchikov tetrahedron equation to an infrared duality between two quantum field theories. Solutions of the tetrahedron equation with continuous spin variables are obtained from partition functions of this theory and its variants.
item.dc:creator: Junya Yagi
